subject: Appointment of Independent Engineer (IE) / Authority Engineer (AE) / Supervision Consultant (SC)
text: HRd <rfy <THri gfearur T9 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (7345 4aevt 3 RTAFf TATTY) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) Gl-5 &a 6, RF2r-10, ERGT, 7f fait 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Consultancy Contracts /2020 No_ 10.1.24/2020, Dated the 3rd November, 2020 [Decision Taken on File No. NHAI/UP(WJ/BRL Y-STRGNJISC/202O, E-File No.-1167] Sub.: Appointment of Independent Engineer (IE) Authority Engineer (AE) Supervision Consultant (SC) The following amendment is issued to Policy Guidelines No. 10.1.21/2020 dated 21.05.2020 in view of the provisions in RFPs of the consultancy assignments of IE/AE/SC that the consulting firms not having conflict of interest with the Concessionaire/ Contractor shall only be considered for declaring the result of technical evaluation and opening of financial bids. Existing Provision Modified as the financial bids of Civil Work the financial bids of Civil Works Contracts will be opened only after the Contracts will be opened only after the award of IEZAEISC Contract. evaluation committee of NHAI completes the technical evaluation/ scores of the bids of IEIAEISC contracts. After declaration of L-1 bidder of civil work contract and after ascertaining the conflict of interest, the result of technical evaluation/ scores will be declared and the financial bids of IE/AEISC contracts will be opened, who are not having the conflict of interest with L-1 bidder. 0 3/4vo20 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) All officers at NHAI HQ /ROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices Copy to: AlI Members/CVo PS to Chairman Hindi Division- for translation in Hindi 'M1 U 7 M NHAL
